promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young simple gorilla normal-type pokemon with opal fur. It can be found in grassland-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or gorilla. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Opalongo, a a young simple gorilla normal-type pokemon. It can be found in grassland-like environments It has the following abilities: Sand-attack. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gorilla", "normal" or "Opalongo". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, gorilla-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, bright lighting
generatedDescription: This playful primate frolics in meadows, creating sandy whirlwinds to confuse foes. Its jovial nature belies its power.
